summary: This bill addresses the issue of "Misbehaving Content Scrapers", likely concerning the unauthorized or disruptive scraping of online data. It instructs scrapers to respect "robots.txt" directives, indicating a focus on website access protocols. The bill acknowledges that the scraper's IP address has been rate limited, suggesting limitations on access, and directs the scraper to use the GPO.gov Bulk Data Download service (https://www.gpo.gov/fdsys/bulkdata/) as an alternative source.
